content: type of instructions this pattern has simple easy to follow written instructions and does not include any charts the crochet pattern is written using american standard crochet terms finished sizes 17 x 60 inches 17 x 64 25 inches 17 x 70 inches 17 x 74 25 inches yarn lion brand hue & me hook n/15 - 10mm crochet hook delivery instant pdf download languages english only terms of use for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy all digital sales are final pattern support & questions email hellotrulycrochet at gmail com about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern which can be found here https //trulycrochet com/ featuring ads
